short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A set of enhancements for Bitbucket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to make working with Bitbucket a little bit easier.

Current Features:

- When creating a pull request for a forked repository in Bitbucket, the target repository will automatically be changed to the repository that is creating the pull request, rather than the forked repository
- A copy button that appears when hovering over "code", that is, text that was entered within backticks, and therefore renders within a description/comment as code
